author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport of #32978 to 11_1_X, needed for HLT TDR. For more details, see the PR description of original PR made to master (11_3_X).

#### PR validation:
runTheMatrix.py -l 23234.0 #2026D49 ttbar (HLT TDR baseline w/ HGCal v11)
Also validated by running EGM phase2 HLT setup in 11_1_7.
title: Seed TICL by L1 & other timing considerations for EGM HLT: backport to 11_1
